page.title: 05BUSINESS IN THE AREA
page.content: There is not a lot of business in this area.It is mainly a farming area.There are two general stores in Plumpton Green,and a butcher.There is also one in East Chiltington.There are two pubs in the village,the Sun and the Fountain,and one in East Chiltington called The Jolly Sportsman.There are two garages,both which mend cars. Hamsey Brickworks makes two types of brick.Sussex is famous for bricks.In East Chiltington there is a blacksmith.There is also a farm where solar panels are made.Recently Hills of Plumpton have opened an H.G.V.driving school.There are probably many people working from their own homes we cannot see.
